Discord.DiscordUpdateMessage: @here New Conan Server Version Detected, Build: @version. The server will restart in @announcebefore.
Discord.DiscordServerUptimeMessage: The Conan server has been running for @uptime. Restarts are scheduled every @restartinterval. The server will restart in @countdownminutes.
Discord.DiscordServerRestartingMessage: @here The Conan server will restart in @countdownminutes. It will show online in a few minutes.
Discord.DiscordServerNotRunning: @here The Conan server was not detected as running. It will start now, and be online within 2-3 Minutes

Twitch.TwitchUpdateMessage: New Conan Server Version Detected, Build: @version. The server will restart in @announcebefore.
Twitch.TwitchServerUptimeMessage: The Conan server has been running for @uptime. Restarts are scheduled every @restartinterval. The server will restart in @countdownminutes.
Twitch.TwitchServerRestartingMessage: The Conan Server is now restarting. It will show online in a few minutes
Twitch.TwitchServerNotRunning: The Conan server was not detected as running. It will start now, and be online within 2-3 Minutes
